Name: SuriKitchen
Review Text: Sandwiches taste very good and have reasanoble prices. Very friendly staff. Definitely recommend!

Name: SuriKitchen
Review Text: Do you realise how loud your filter is and that all the smell coming into the apartments? It's 1:30am and the kitchen is still working and my bedroom is smelly. Sometimes your back door is open at 4am and able to hear the workers talking. If it doesn't stop further action will be taken! This is unacceptable!

Name: SuriKitchen
Review Text: Inedible roti, had to throw it away, drenched in 2 fingers of water, egg was grey inside, chicken was shredded and looked like it was chewed on and the roti itself was dry of texture. Waste of money when there is an abundance of good roti ‚Ä¶

Name: SuriKitchen
Review Text: Surprisingly good. Had an excellent Roti. Service is a bit slow though. But who cares if the food is good.

Name: SuriKitchen
Review Text: Nice big Soto soup for low price. I love this place and people who work there are nice.

Name: SuriKitchen
Review Text: Just OK, but there's much better Surinamese places around.

Name: SuriKitchen
Review Text: Good food, well priced. Can be a bit slow.

Name: SuriKitchen
Review Text: Great flavourful food for a good price

Review Text: (Translated by Google) It took almost half an hour to make 1 chicken sandwich and a telo with baking cod. Sandwich was not fresh and chicken dry .. Bakkeljauw did not really taste but the cassava potato was okay. The person who took the ‚Ä¶

Name: SuriKitchen
Review Text: (Translated by Google) Previously good food, are very bad! :( Telow bakkeljouw way too salty, not tasty, roti not fresh either, a waste of money and the long waiting time. It is the last time I got food here, the toko close !!!!!!!! ‚Ä¶

Name: SuriKitchen
Review Text: (Translated by Google) I ordered on the internet so that I could pick it up later, but I think that portion still had to be scooped. It was chaos in the tent. ‚Ä¶

Name: SuriKitchen
Review Text: (Translated by Google) first times fantastic, today absolutely bad: tasteless potatoes, tough, dry roti, watery sauce and the garter tasted like sugar ... and to top it all off: there was hardly any meat on the dry chicken. ‚Ä¶

Name: SuriKitchen
Review Text: (Translated by Google) 2 sandwiches. And both not completely eaten. Very floury shrimp, no structure at all, weird color too. Have probably been frozen for a long time. The chicken curry, surely the most ordered sandwich in many Surinamese ‚Ä¶

Name: SuriKitchen
Review Text: (Translated by Google) Quality of the dishes delivered by SuriKitchen is not always consistent. A counter clerk scribbling at his hair who is then packing your food does not make a good impression. For me, an address to pass by. ‚Ä¶

Name: SuriKitchen
Review Text: (Translated by Google) Fabulous vegetarian roti with tempeh and tofu. One downside that we could not get the second time because potatoes had run out. Other dishes were tasty but not as phenomenal as the roti ‚Ä¶

Name: SuriKitchen
Review Text: (Translated by Google) Today ordered from you again after a long time. Is there another cook? The roti was watery, the vegetables bland. The roti chicken had an almost meatless chicken leg. I was always very enthusiastic. Such a pity... ‚Ä¶

Name: SuriKitchen
Review Text: (Translated by Google) What has happened here lately? This was once a beautiful place with good food and friendly people. I really liked coming regularly. Not the last time and today was really the last time. First ordered from a terribly ‚Ä¶

Name: SuriKitchen
Review Text: (Translated by Google) Delicious saoto. Chicken sandwich a bit dry but authentic in taste. I am certainly satisfied with it and will return here more often! ‚Ä¶
